Generate a JSON file with derivation paths and dependencies from a Nix file

Source: R/generate_path_mapping.R
generate_path_mapping.Rd

Generate a JSON file with derivation paths and dependencies from a Nix file

Usage

generate_path_mapping(
  nix_file = "pipeline.nix",
  attributes,
  output_file = "pathMapping.json"
)

Arguments

nix_file

Path to the Nix file (default: "pipeline.nix")

attributes

Vector of derivation attributes (e.g., c("mtcars_am", "mtcars_head"))

output_file

Path to the output JSON file (default: "pathMapping.json")

Value

Creates the JSON file and invisibly returns the JSON structure as a list
